scripts.deployWeb: yarn workspace web build; cp -R web/dist/* nginx/html
scripts.all: yarn u format -w; yarn u lint --fix; yarn u testOnce; yarn b format -w; yarn b lint --fix; yarn b testOnce
scripts.db: cd docker; docker compose up -d db
scripts.nginx: cd docker; docker compose up nginx
scripts.dbKill: cd docker; docker compose down db
scripts.sql: cd docker; docker compose exec postgres psql -U postgres -d wonderwhy
